name: getTotalSpace
description: Returns the total disk space or in-memory space avaialbe for an appliation.

params.name: path
params.description: path to the hard drive or for in memory file system.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: the in-memory file system memory set in cfadmin and should return that.
examples.code:
<cfset totalRMSSpace = getTotalSpace('ram')>
<cfoutput>total app ram memory: #decimalFormat(totalRamSpace)/(1024 * 1024)# mb</cfoutput>
